name: Slime Boys
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK game jam.

You control two slime boys bound together by an unbreakable slime bond. Traverse through puzzle platform levels and make it to the end.

Could also be fun playing with a friend with one person on "wasd" and one on "arrow keys" as in the good old days.

Click options on the menu screen, or "Escape" in game to bring up a small menu with description of the controls.

The last level is a little to hard, sorry about that.

This is a solo project, art, sounds and scripts were created during the game jam.
